title: WEAVE: The next generation wide-field spectroscopy facility for the WHT (Cambridge Element: 2013/14)
abstractText: This is a joint proposal and this section is completed on the Lead Institution application
impactText: This grant supported the development of the early stage design of the WEAVE spectrograph. During this period, approval for the full build of the system was granted. Healthcare
findingsText: The grant supported initial development work of the data management system for the WEAVE spectrograph. Data analysis techniques have relevance in fields such as medical imaging. Environment,Healthcare
